history.proof: intros. unfold cohMT, valid, dsoup in *. srun best use: valid_mt_soup, is_true_true unfold: PCM.valid, dsoup, is_true inv: dstatelet.

exceptions.exn: In environment dstate : lstate_type heap dsoup : soup H : {| dstate := dstate; dsoup := dsoup |} = empty_dstatelet Unable to unify "{| dstate := dstate; dsoup := dsoup |} = empty_dstatelet" with "is_true (PCM.valid_op (PCM.class (union_mapPCM mid (msg TaggedMessage))) dsoup)".

original: intros d H. unfold cohMT, valid, dsoup in *. destruct d as [dstate dsoup]. apply H.
